content: Former VP Dick Cheney stated yesterday that Barak Obama would be "responsible" for America's next 9/11. He claimed that changed governmnt policies were weakening America's ability to defend against 'terror'. One of those 'defenses' was torture, prescribed by Mr.Cheney himself. In a related story, a new book detailing torture techniques used in US establishments in Afghanistan,Iraq and Guantanamo was released on Monday. In it the author Mark Danner cites a leaked 2007 Red Cross report on the subject. >http://www.thestar.com/News/World/article/603271 The report was never issued by the IRC which refuses to comment. The subject, however, is fairly-well documented in other sources. In a third related story, and one that may affect Mr. Cheney personally in future, is a report that peace groups had attempted to have war crimes charges laid against ex-president Bush on a speaking engagement in Canada this week. "If not this time,there will be another.", the leader of the group is quoted as saying.

content: Former VP Dick Cheney stated yesterday that Barak Obama would be "responsible" for America's next 9/11. He claimed that changed governmnt policies were weakening America's ability to defend against 'terror'. One of those 'defenses' was torture, prescribed by Mr.Cheney himself. In a related story, a new book detailing torture techniques used in US establishments in Afghanistan,Iraq and Guantanamo was released on Monday. In it the author Mark Danner cites a leaked 2007 Red Cross report on the subject. >http://www.thestar.com/News/World/article/603271 The report was never issued by the IRC which refuses to comment. The subject, however, is fairly-well documented in other sources. In a third related story, and one that may affect Mr. Cheney personally in future, is a report that peace groups had attempted to have war crimes charges laid against ex-president Bush on a speaking engagement in Canada this week. "If not this time,there will be another.", the leader of the group is quoted as saying.

content: Former VP Dick Cheney stated yesterday that Barak Obama would be "responsible" for America's next 9/11. He claimed that changed governmnt policies were weakening America's ability to defend against 'terror'. One of those 'defenses' was torture, prescribed by Mr.Cheney himself. In a related story, a new book detailing torture techniques used in US establishments in Afghanistan,Iraq and Guantanamo was released on Monday. In it the author Mark Danner cites a leaked 2007 Red Cross report on the subject. >http://www.thestar.com/News/World/article/603271 The report was never issued by the IRC which refuses to comment. The subject, however, is fairly-well documented in other sources. In a third related story, and one that may affect Mr. Cheney personally in future, is a report that peace groups had attempted to have war crimes charges laid against ex-president Bush on a speaking engagement in Canada this week. "If not this time,there will be another.", the leader of the group is quoted as saying.

content: Former VP Dick Cheney stated yesterday that Barak Obama would be "responsible" for America's next 9/11. He claimed that changed governmnt policies were weakening America's ability to defend against 'terror'. One of those 'defenses' was torture, prescribed by Mr.Cheney himself. In a related story, a new book detailing torture techniques used in US establishments in Afghanistan,Iraq and Guantanamo was released on Monday. In it the author Mark Danner cites a leaked 2007 Red Cross report on the subject. >http://www.thestar.com/News/World/article/603271 The report was never issued by the IRC which refuses to comment. The subject, however, is fairly-well documented in other sources. In a third related story, and one that may affect Mr. Cheney personally in future, is a report that peace groups had attempted to have war crimes charges laid against ex-president Bush on a speaking engagement in Canada this week. "If not this time,there will be another.", the leader of the group is quoted as saying.
